descriptionlist.description:
Compatible with iOS 8 and 9
OneHandWizard solves one the biggest issues we have all had with newer iphones, especially the 6 and 6 plus. Till now, it was impossible to use the iPhone comfortably with one hand, causing clumsiness and plenty of discomfort.

OneHandWizard is here to let you now fully enjoy your iPhone in one hand mode with the following functionality:
- Full one handed use by simply double tapping the home button ( triple press on iPhone 5/5c) - Resize one hand mode to fit your actual thumb reach - Left and right hand mode with simple edge drag - Volume,mute and other controls in one hand mode - Take screenshots in one hand mode - Stay in one hand mode as long as needed as opposed to Iphone’s reachability which auto forces you out of one hand mode - Endless activation methods thanks to Activator - We are the only one hand solution for the lock screen allowing you comfortable usage
